item.title: Introduction
item.description: lightGallery Full featured javascript gallery for web and mobile. Demo JQuery lightGallery demo. Codepen demo Main features Fully responsive. Modular architecture with built in plugins. Touch and support for mobile devices. Mouse drag supports for desktops. Double-click/Double-tap to see actual size of the image. Animated thumbnails. Social sharing. YouTube Vimeo Wistia and html5 videos Support. 20+ Hardware-Accelerated CSS3 transitions. Dynamic mode. Full screen support. Zoom in/out, Pinch to zoom.

item.title: Options
item.description: Passing options lightGallery(document.getElementById('gallery-container'), { speed: 500, mode: 'fade', }); lightGallery core Name Type Default addClass string "" Description Add custom class for gallery container this can be used to set different style for different galleries allowMediaOverlap boolean false Description If true, toolbar, captions and thumbnails will not overlap with media element This will not effect thumbnails if animateThumb is false Also, toggle thumbnails button is not displayed if allowMediaOverlap is false Note - Changing the position of the media on every slide transition creates a flickering effect.

item.title: Events
item.description: Usage example const lg = document.getElementById('custom-events-demo'); // Perform any action just before opening the gallery lg.addEventListener('beforeOpen', () => { alert('onBeforeOpen'); }); // custom event with extra parameters lg.addEventListener('beforeSlide', (event) => { const { index, prevIndex } = event.detail; alert(index, prevIndex); }); lightGallery(lg); Nameinit.lg Description Fired only once when lightGallery is initialized Event object Name Type Description instance LightGallery lightGallery plugin instance NamebeforeOpen.

item.title: Methods
item.description: Access plugin instance const lg = document.getElementById('lg-method-demo'); const plugin = lightGallery(lg); // Go to third slide // Index starts from 0 plugin.slide(2); closeGallery Close lightGallery. Close lightGallery if it is opened Example Example const plugin = lightGallery(); plugin.closeGallery(); destroy Destroy lightGallery. Destroy lightGallery and its plugin instances completely Example Example const plugin = lightGallery(); plugin.destroy(); goToNextSlide Go to next slide Example const plugin = lightGallery(); plugin.
